Comment: The 38-year-old Simion has positioned himself as a champion of democracy and the rule of law. The candidate told Politico in a recent interview that his campaign is a fight to “reinstate democracy, the people’s will, the rule of law and the constitutional order.”  He has also aligned himself with the U.S. MAGA movement, recently visiting Washington to meet with former Trump adviser Steve Bannon and author and activist Jack Posobeic.
